mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.roadid AS "roadid", a.pointid AS "pointid", a.jointwellnumber AS "jointwellnumber", a.cabletype AS "cabletype", a.cablemanufacturer AS "cablemanufacturer", a.cablelength AS "cablelength", a.attachmenttype AS "attachmenttype", a.attachmentmanufacturer AS "attachmentmanufacturer", a.groundingmode AS "groundingmode"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM material_report a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.id DESC

SELECT
FROM material_report a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material_report( id, roadid, pointid, jointwellnumber, cabletype, cablemanufacturer, cablelength, attachmenttype, attachmentmanufacturer, groundingmode ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{roadid}, #{pointid}, #{jointwellnumber}, #{cabletype}, #{cablemanufacturer}, #{cablelength}, #{attachmenttype}, #{attachmentmanufacturer}, #{groundingmode} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE material_report
roadid = #{roadid},
pointid = #{pointid},
jointwellnumber = #{jointwellnumber},
cabletype = #{cabletype},
cablemanufacturer = #{cablemanufacturer},
cablelength = #{cablelength},
attachmenttype = #{attachmenttype},
attachmentmanufacturer = #{attachmentmanufacturer},
groundingmode = #{groundingmode},
WHERE id = #{id}
